scripts.compile:webview: cd src/webview-ui && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.quality-gate: npm run test:coverage && npm run coverage:check
scripts.package: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/webview-ui/node_modules && npm install && vsce package
scripts.publish: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/webview-ui/node_modules && npm install && vsce publish && npx ovsx publish -p $OVSX_PAT
scripts.publish:pre: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/webview-ui/node_modules && npm install && vsce publish --pre-release && npx ovsx publish --pre-release -p $OVSX_PAT
scripts.vscode:prepublish:esbuild: npm run compile:webview && npm run compile:esbuild
